subtitle.main: Bridging exceptional talent with visionary organizations across continents.

apply.title: Apply
apply.subtitle: If you have any questions or require further assistance, please contact us.

forEmployers.title: Partner with DTO PARTNERS
forEmployers.description: For clients interested in our specialized recruitment services, we invite you to reach out to us directly at
forEmployers.details: Our dedicated team is committed to understanding your unique hiring needs and delivering tailored solutions with efficiency and discretion. We look forward to partnering with you to secure top-tier talent that drives your organization's success.

forCandidates.title: Your Career, Our Priority
forCandidates.description: Job openings are by policy not publicly disclosed. We proactively connect with candidates through our established network and direct outreach, ensuring a personalized service depending on client needs.
forCandidates.gdprInfo: At DTO Partners we prioritize data protection and confidentiality. When contacting a candidate about a client mandate, we require your explicit consent to share your CV, in full compliance with GDPR and all applicable data protection legislation.
forCandidates.formNote: Candidates must also complete the form below with additional details for best profiling.

form.title: Application Form

fields.name: Name and surname*
fields.workAuth: Are you currently legally authorized to work in the country where the job is located?
fields.assistance: If not, would you require assistance from the hiring company to obtain the necessary legal documentation/visa for employment?
fields.additionalPlaceholder: Tell us more about yourself and your experience...

form.consent: I consent to the processing of my personal data by DTO Partners Sp. z o.o. for the purpose of responding to and handling the submitted inquiry. I acknowledge that I have the right to access my data, the possibility of correcting it and requesting that it no longer be processed. The data administrator is DTO Partners Sp. z o.o. ul. Jana Heweliusza 11 lok. 811 80-890 Gdańsk, NIP 5833531476. Information on the processing of your personal data can be found in our

about.title: About
about.subtitle: DTO Partners
about.description1: DTO Partners is an international recruitment company headquartered in Poland. Our foundations were built by managers with recognized experience in Investment Management, Food Science and Engineering, within major international private and public organizations.
about.description2: DTO Partners has been approved and registered with the National Register of Recruitment Firms by the Ministry of Family, Labour and Social Policies of the Republic of Poland, highlighting our commitment to provide trustworthy and high-quality services tailored to your needs.

expertise.title: Global Reach, Local Excellence
expertise.industriesDescription: Diverse sectors, unified excellence in talent acquisition.

header.title: Our Partnerships
header.subtitle: Across The World
header.description: At DTO Partners, our network reaches across continents, with strategic focus on Europe and Middle East. We deliver tailored solutions to meet unique industry challenges for our clients worldwide.
header.recruitment: Our recruitment covers junior to executive search, including government-authorized professionals.

map.title: Global Network Overview
map.description: Click on regions to explore our presence

modal.noIndustries: No industries currently listed for this country.

accordion.partnershipText: Explore our partnerships across these strategic markets:

header.title: Industries
header.subtitle: We Serve
header.description: Delivering exceptional talent across diverse sectors with precision, expertise, and unwavering commitment to excellence.

finance.title: FINANCE
finance.subtitle: Empowering financial growth.
finance.description: We provide expert recruitment for asset management, private banking, and corporate banking, ensuring compliance and operational excellence.

detailedServices.title: Detailed Services
services: Wealth Management and Private Banking (KYC/AML, Legal, Compliance, Lending, Relationship Management, Structuring, Operations, Project Management)
Corporate Banking (KYC/AML, Legal, Compliance, Lending, Relationship Management, Structuring, Operations, Project Management)

healthcare.title: HEALTHCARE
healthcare.subtitle: Caring for communities.
healthcare.description: We connect top talent with hospitals, clinics, and care centers, supporting quality healthcare delivery across regions.

itCybersecurity.title: IT & CYBERSECURITY
itCybersecurity.subtitle: Securing digital futures.
itCybersecurity.description: Our network delivers skilled professionals in IT support, project management, and cybersecurity to drive innovation and safety.

hospitality.title: HOSPITALITY
hospitality.subtitle: Excellence in service.
hospitality.description: We recruit for hotels and resorts, focusing on guest experience and operational efficiency in the hospitality sector.

foodEngineering.title: FOOD ENGINEERING
foodEngineering.subtitle: Quality from field to table.
foodEngineering.description: We support the food industry with experts in safety management, documentation, and regulatory compliance for global standards.

detailedServices.title: Detailed Services
services: Creation of documentation according to and working with standards ISO 9001, IFS FOODS, BRC, HACCP, GHP/GMP
Food and safety training in accordance with national and international legislation
Knowledge of national and international food and nutrition safety regulations
Representation of companies before state authorities in the field of, inter alia, food safety control
Preparation of documentation for the food and beverage industry, inter alia for the expansion of business activities, the opening of catering facilities

header.title: Our Values
header.description: These five values define who we are, how we work, and how we grow — with our partners, candidates, and team.

confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
confidentiality.subtitle: A value we never compromise.
confidentiality.description: We treat confidentiality as the core of our services, safeguarding your information with the highest standards of discretion.

multiculturalism.title: Multiculturalism
multiculturalism.subtitle: We see diversity as strength.
multiculturalism.description: We honor and respect the culture and practices of each country we operate in, ensuring our recruitment reflects the diversity and uniqueness of those cultures.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.subtitle: Moving fast, with purpose.
efficiency.description: We focus on providing effective and streamlined recruitment solutions that deliver real results.

transparency.title: Transparency
transparency.subtitle: Clarity builds trust.
transparency.description: We believe in open, clear communication with clients and candidates at every step of the process.

internationalization.title: Internationalization
internationalization.subtitle: Connecting people, globally.
internationalization.description: Our mission is to connect talent and opportunity across borders, enabling global career growth.
